description: Teleport to a nearby location. Get close, or get away.

effects.title: Weak
effects.text: For 0.25 seconds after teleporting, you will only deal 25% damage and cannot deal fatal damage.

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

effects.title: Void recharge
effects.text: Cools down 2x faster when in the void.
